author: epg
msg: Add log-revprops capability, and use that to determine whether the
server can send custom revprops in log.
(get_vsn_options): Add above new header to OPTIONS response.
(svn_client_log4): Use new capability to decide whether or not to go
into pre-1.5 mode rather than try and assume SVN_ERR_RA_NOT_IMPLEMENTED
means the server doesn't have this capability.
(log_start_element): Stop looking for "no-custom-revprops" element and setting
(svn_ra_neon__get_log): Determine whether caller wants custom revprops in
new want_custom_revprops local rather than log_ctx->want_custom_revprops
and use that and new capability check to raise SVN_ERR_RA_NOT_IMPLEMENTED.
(start_log): Stop looking for "no-custom-revprops" element and setting
(svn_ra_serf__get_log): Determine whether caller wants custom revprops in
new want_custom_revprops local rather than log_ctx->want_custom_revprops
and use that and new capability check to raise SVN_ERR_RA_NOT_IMPLEMENTED.

author: cmpilato
msg: Some simplifications to ra-serf's get-locations implementation.
helper function, and lose a bunch of duplicated logic as a result.

author: hwright
msg: In the command line client, don't reference a pointer to a local variable
(svn_cl__copy): Allocate the peg revision for each copy source on the heap,
instead of just using a pointer to the loop variable (which changes each time

author: joeswatosh
msg: New tests to show that the depth (or recurse) arguments to propset, propget,
and proplist on Svn::Client::Context are handled correctly.  Plus handling
Svn::Client::Context#proplist): Change the argument name to depth_or_recurse
and calculate the depth from the argument.
